§ Every Currency Is A Meme

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

⸺ published 2018-06-14T14:41:40-07:00

From //Simon de la Rouvier//:

― Every currency is a meme.
― Some just have stronger memes.
― Soon every meme will also be a currency.
―
― //meme-markets//

AFAIK, //Simon de la Rouvier// wasn't at DogeCon, but — //Matt Lockyer// referenced this post of //Simon de la Rouvier//'s with respect to //DogeCon//.
